code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Flashcard(_ref){let{songFilename}=_ref;const handleGenerateFlashcard=async()=>{const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/get-flashcard/${songFilename}`);if(response.ok){const blob=await response.blob();const audioUrl=URL.createObjectURL(blob);const audioElement=document.getElementById('song-clip');audioElement.src=audioUrl;}else{alert('Failed to generate flashcard');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:songFilename}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleGenerateFlashcard,children:"Generate Flashcard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("audio",{id:"song-clip",controls:true})]});}export default Flashcard;
